select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review( review_no, review_title, review_member_id, review_content, review_time_posted ) values(#{reviewNo}, #{reviewTitle},#{memberId},#{reviewContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT review_no, review_title, review_member_id, review_time_posted,review_hit FROM ( SELECT review_no, review_title, review_member_id, review_time_posted,review_hit, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page FROM ( SELECT review_no, review_title, review_member_id, review_like_count, review_hit, to_char(review_time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD') as review_time_posted FROM review order by review_no desc ) ) WHERE PAGE=#{value}

select review_no, review_title, review_member_id, review_content, review_time_posted, review_hit, (select count(*) from review_like l where l.review_no=#{value}) as review_like_count from review where review_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update review set review_title=#{reviewTitle}, review_content=#{reviewContent} where review_no=#{reviewNo}
update review set review_hit=review_hit+1 where review_no=#{value}
mapper.select: select review_like_member_id from review_like where review_no=#{reviewNo} and review_like_member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into review_like(review_like_no, review_no, review_like_member_id) values(review_like_seq.nextval, #{reviewNo}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from review_like where review_no=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from review_like where review_no=#{reviewNo} and review_like_member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(review_no) from review_comment where review_no=#{value}
select count(review_no) from review_like where review_no=#{value}
select review_no from (select count(*) as like_count ,review_no from review_like group by review_no order by like_count desc) where rownum<4 and like_count>=5

select review_no, review_title, review_member_id, (select file_path from review_file where rownum<2 and review_no=#{value}) as file_path, (select count(*) from review_like where review_no=#{value}) as review_like_count from review where review_no=#{value}
